attributes.action: Not to ban Drivers from smoking in cars
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Suddenly smoking in cars has become dangerous, despite it being around as long as cars. We are not constantly swerving out of the way of people dropping their cigarettes in their laps, and quoting 'potential' accidents as opposed to hard facts by no means justifies the action of banning.  Lets use some common sense for a change, and stop the ever creeping policing of our lives.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
